data.text: Eka Elifaz ja-Teman nodwoko niya,
“Dhano adhana to konyo Nyasaye gangʼo?
Ere ohala ma Jehova Nyasaye Maratego yudo kibedo ngʼat makare?
“Iparo ni Nyasaye kwedi kendo kumi
Donge otimoni kamano
Ne ikawo lep oweteni kaka gir singo miweyogi duk;
Ne ituono joma ool pi modho
ne itimo kamano kata obedo nine in ngʼama duongʼ,
Ne ok ikonyo mon ma chwogi otho
Mano emomiyo obadho oluori moketi diere
Mano emomiyo mudho olwori ma ok inyal neno
“Donge Nyasaye odak e polo malo?
To eka in iwacho ni, ‘Nyasaye to ongʼeyo angʼo?
Boche mogingore oime, omiyo ok onyal nenowa
Idwaro siko e yore machon
ma gin joma ne kargi olal nono kapok ndalogi ochopo
Negiwachone Nyasaye ni, ‘Wewa mos!’
To eka Nyasaye ema ne opongʼo utegi gi gik mabeyo,
Joma kare neno masira to pod gimor amora,
‘Adier, wasikwa osetieki,
“Chiwri ni Nyasaye mondo ibed kode gi kwe,
Rwak puonj mowuok e dhoge
Ka idok ir Jehova Nyasaye Maratego,
kendo ka ikawo kitegi ma nengogi tek ka gima nono
eka Jehova Nyasaye Maratego nobed dhahabu mari,
Adier, iniyud mor kuom Jehova Nyasaye Maratego
Inilame kendo enowinji,
Gimoro amora michano timo biro dhi maber,
Ka ji jaro jowetegi kendo ikwayo Jehova Nyasaye ni, ‘Resgi!’
Obiro resi kata ngʼama onge ketho;
